author: Staff Reporter
text:
School students practising dance as part of Republic Day rehearsal in Salem on Saturday.

Over 800 students from various schools across the district will be performing at the 68{+t}{+h}Republic Day celebrations at Mahatma Gandhi Stadium here on January 26.

The rehearsal was held on Saturday where school students performed various programmes in the presence of officials.

Collector V. Sampath will unfurl the national flag at 8 a.m. on Tuesday in the presence of District Revenue Officer R. Sugumar and other senior district-level officials.

Aid to be distributed

Apart from cultural programmes, freedom fighters will be honoured and beneficiaries under government schemes will be given assistance.

Certificates

Best performing government officials in the district will be given certificates apart from honouring them.
title: Over 800 school students participate in Republic Day rehearsal
